🎨 Themes

🍦

Frosty Soft-Serve

Cleaning, operation, and troubleshooting

📖 Manual 🛠 Parts 🚨 Troubleshooting

Cleaning Schedule

  • Daily: Rinse, sanitize, lube seals and O-rings
  • Weekly: Full teardown, soak parts, inspect beater
  • Monthly: Replace wearable seals and gaskets

Operating Specs

Draw Temp18°F
ViscosityTarget 220
Hopper Temp36°F

Troubleshooting

Product Too Soft
  • Increase viscosity setting
  • Verify mix temperature
  • Check beater motor amps
Won't Freeze
  • Check refrigeration pressures
  • Clean condenser coil
  • Verify mix in hopper

Wiring Diagram
